peripheralPage.name: _instance

binaryOption.name: pmc_lvdsc1_lvdie
binaryOption.toolTip: Enables hardware interrupt requests for LVDF

binaryOption.name: pmc_lvdsc1_lvdre
binaryOption.toolTip: This write-once bit enables LVDF events to generate a hardware reset.\n Additional writes are ignored.

peripheralPage.template:
//! Default value for Low Voltage Detect Status And Control 1 register
 	static constexpr uint32_t pmc_lvdsc1 = 	 PMC_LVDSC1_LVDIE($(pmc_lvdsc1_lvdie)) | // Low-Voltage Detect Interrupt Enable 	 PMC_LVDSC1_LVDRE($(pmc_lvdsc1_lvdre)); // Low-Voltage Detect Reset Enable

binaryOption.name: pmc_lvdsc2_lvwie
binaryOption.toolTip: Enables hardware interrupt requests for LVWF

peripheralPage.template:
//! Default value for Low Voltage Detect Status And Control 2 register
 	static constexpr uint32_t pmc_lvdsc2 = 	 PMC_LVDSC2_LVWIE($(pmc_lvdsc2_lvwie)); // Low-Voltage Warning Interrupt Enable

binaryOption.name: pmc_regsc_lpodis
binaryOption.toolTip: May be used to disable the LPO.

binaryOption.name: pmc_regsc_clkbiasdis
binaryOption.toolTip:
May be used to disable the bias currents and reference voltages for some 
 clock modules to further reduce power consumption in VLPS mode. 
 Note: It must be ensured that respective clock modules are disabled in VLPS
 otherwise severe malfunction of clock modules will happen.

choice.name: Disabled - SIRC/FIRC/PLL clocks unavailable in VLPS

binaryOption.name: pmc_regsc_biasen
binaryOption.toolTip:
Controls source and well biasing for the core logic in low power mode. 
 In full performance mode this option has no effect. 
 This is useful to further reduce MCU power consumption in low power mode. 
 This bit must be set to 1 when using VLP* modes.

peripheralPage.template:
//! Default value for Regulator Status And Control register
 	static constexpr uint32_t pmc_regsc = 	 PMC_REGSC_LPODIS($(pmc_regsc_lpodis)) | // Low power oscillator disable 	 PMC_REGSC_CLKBIASDIS($(pmc_regsc_clkbiasdis)) | // Clock bias disable 	 PMC_REGSC_BIASEN($(pmc_regsc_biasen)); // Core bias enable
